channel.title: developers on Dvir Segal's blog
channel.description: Recent content in developers on Dvir Segal's blog

item.title: Building trust through effective communication
item.description: You can achieve almost anything by teamwork. Listening is a vital characteristic of a leader. Effectively communicating your thoughts is essential, as well. How you interact can positively and negatively affect the relationships you have in your work (and personal life too). Effective communication is defined by various articles (#1, #2, #3, and more), and I challenge myself not to repeat them. I would like to give a different perspective on the matter.
